name: Altr
description:
Mighty Switch Force inspired 2D platform game made in 4 weeks. Press e to switch the environment state. Switching while next to a ground pillar launches you into the air.

Created by

Programmer/ Level Designer - Alex Borg

Character Artist/Animator/ Sound Designer/co-programmer - Matt Duan

Artist/Animator - Susan Dang

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

E to switch
